title: Topic 001 Question 069
body: You are building an internet-based training solution. The solution requires that a user's camera and microphone remain enabled.
You need to monitor a video stream of the user and detect when the user asks an instructor a question. The solution must minimize development effort.
What should you include in the solution?
options: speech-to-text in the Azure AI Speech service
language detection in Azure AI Language Service
the Face service in Azure AI Vision
object detection in Azure AI Custom Vision
